title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 598-5.2 - Prohibitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 598-5.2 - Prohibitions

State Regulations
(a) Delivery prohibition. No person may
deliver or cause the delivery of a hazardous substance to any tank system whose
fill port has a tag attached. No person may accept a delivery of a hazardous
substance to any tank system whose fill port has a tag attached. (b) Tag tampering and removal prohibition. Unless authorized by the department, no person may tamper with or remove a tag
attached to a fill port or cause such tampering or removal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
598-5.2

Adopted

New

York State Register July 19, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 29, eff. 10/17/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
